name: Petals (vilppujrvinen)
description:
In petals you play as a lone flower petal and journey on to find others of your kind, getting to meet queer and trans icons of color on your way. Pride is still in progress, and in order to move forward we need to remember who have paved the way for us in the past.

Programming: Tiki

Art & Animation: Hunter

Game design, Art & Animation: Vilppu Järvinen

Music: Cecil Opia
